### consumesDstSelForwardingOperand() {#a1076b6c332565550ddb86584b25f5df7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool consumesDstSelForwardingOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; VALU, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42; Dst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siregisterinfo">SIRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Checks whether the provided <code>MI</code> &quot;consumes&quot; the operand with a Dest sel fowarding issue <code>Dst</code> .

We may &quot;consume&quot; the Dst via a standard explicit RAW, or through irregular ways (e.g implicit RAW, certain types of WAW)

### getDstSelForwardingOperand() {#a3a1aa0c4abee6f79580733a3c6e9077f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static const MachineOperand &#42; getDstSelForwardingOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnsubtarget">GCNSubtarget</a> &amp; ST)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Dest sel forwarding issue occurs if additional logic is needed to swizzle / pack the computed value into correct bit position of the dest register.

This occurs if we have SDWA with dst&#95;sel != DWORD or if we have op&#95;sel with dst&#95;sel that is not aligned to the register. This function analayzes the <code>MI</code> and 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
an operand with dst forwarding issue, or nullptr if none exists.
</SectionUser>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625" lineLink="#a43bab10420c4f91cf1dbbfbc34660926"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a43bab10420c4f91cf1dbbfbc34660926">breaksVMEMSoftClause</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GCNHazardRecognizer::checkSoftClauseHazards(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;MEM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SMEM soft clause are only present on VI+, and only matter if xnack is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST.isXNACKEnabled())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSMRD = TII.isSMRD(&#42;MEM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  resetClause();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A soft-clause is any group of consecutive SMEM instructions.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions in this group may return out of order and/or may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// replayed (i.e. the same instruction issued more than once).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to handle these situations correctly we need to make sure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when a clause has more than one instruction, no instruction in the clause</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// writes to a register that is read by another instruction in the clause</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (including itself). If we encounter this situation, we need to break the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clause by inserting a non SMEM instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineInstr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : EmittedInstrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we hit a non-SMEM instruction then we have passed the start of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clause and we can stop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsSMRD ? <a href="#a18506bf00376c57b5c843b5253e9712e">breaksSMEMSoftClause</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) : <a href="#a43bab10420c4f91cf1dbbfbc34660926">breaksVMEMSoftClause</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    addClauseInst(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ClauseDefs.none())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to make sure not to put loads and stores in the same clause if they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use the same address. For now, just start a new clause whenever we see a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MEM-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ab96f3235c18e659758517d0532d606c9">mayStore</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  addClauseInst(&#42;MEM);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the set of defs and uses intersect then we cannot add this instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the clause, so we have a hazard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ClauseDefs.anyCommon(ClauseUses) ? 1 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GCNHazardRecognizer::checkSMRDHazards(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;SMRD) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitStatesNeeded = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  WaitStatesNeeded = checkSoftClauseHazards(SMRD);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This SMRD hazard only affects SI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST.hasSMRDReadVALUDefHazard())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitStatesNeeded;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A read of an SGPR by SMRD instruction requires 4 wait states when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SGPR was written by a VALU instruction.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are three different types of instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which produce forwarded dest: 1 SDWA with dst&#95;sel != DWORD, 2 VOP3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which write hi bits (e.g. op&#95;sel&#91;3&#93; == 1), and 3 FP8DstSelInst</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (instructions with dest byte sel, e.g. CVT&#95;SR&#95;BF8&#95;F32) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// op&#95;sel&#91;3:2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// != 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#a3295a9f4a742f69dfa4d7bb91cced3a9">SIInstrInfo::isSDWA</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type 1: SDWA with dst&#95;sel != DWORD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DstSel = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::dst&#95;sel))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstSel-&gt;getImm() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/sdwa/#a487d59303b94fbf4adddd9a08c30da0aaddbc3f8d705f646af626fd73cdf3618b">AMDGPU::SDWA::DWORD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::vdst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a858900adc13a889cf1d8880ef5bb2bd4">AMDGPU::FPType</a> IsFP4OrFP8ConvOpc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a2c8c02eb613c071ae5ebd12779080850">AMDGPU::getFPDstSelType</a>(Opcode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a8f27aa11689bf9b12f6fb0e436e367c7">AMDGPU::hasNamedOperand</a>(Opcode, AMDGPU::OpName::op&#95;sel)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type 2: VOP3 which write the hi bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedImmOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::src0&#95;modifiers) &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sisrcmods/#a4d4c7f0ccdd236a97a1583b77f8fd442a8e2f726558b97b38629c9fa9f8691612">SISrcMods::DST&#95;OP&#95;SEL</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::vdst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type 3: FP8DstSelInst with op&#95;sel&#91;3:2&#93; != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsFP4OrFP8ConvOpc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a858900adc13a889cf1d8880ef5bb2bd4ae32efd813b88548940f8718a61864cf5">AMDGPU::FPType::FP8</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedImmOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::src2&#95;modifiers) &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sisrcmods/#a4d4c7f0ccdd236a97a1583b77f8fd442a3b095994a942145ccaaed4f175c7172a">SISrcMods::OP&#95;SEL&#95;0</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;getNamedOperand(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::vdst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case: nop is required for all the opsel values for fp4 sr variant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cvt scale instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsFP4OrFP8ConvOpc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a858900adc13a889cf1d8880ef5bb2bd4a21c341564f4fcf177d8a5b56c9f52bc9">AMDGPU::FPType::FP4</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks whether the provided \\p MI &quot;consumes&quot; the operand with a Dest sel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fowarding issue \\p Dst . We may &quot;consume&quot; the Dst via a standard explicit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RAW, or through irregular ways (e.g implicit RAW, certain types of WAW)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951" lineLink="#a1076b6c332565550ddb86584b25f5df7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a1076b6c332565550ddb86584b25f5df7">consumesDstSelForwardingOperand</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;VALU,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;Dst,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siregisterinfo">SIRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must consider implicit reads of the VALU. SDWA with dst&#95;sel and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UNUSED&#95;PRESERVE will implicitly read the result from forwarded dest,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we must account for that hazard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also must account for WAW hazards. In particular, WAW with dest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preserve semantics (e.g. VOP3 with op&#95;sel, VOP2 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// !zeroesHigh16BitsOfDest) will read the forwarded dest for parity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check for ECC. Without accounting for this hazard, the ECC will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrong.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: limit to RAW (including implicit reads) + problematic WAW (i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complete zeroesHigh16BitsOfDest)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Operand : VALU-&gt;operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Operand.isReg() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;regsOverlap(Dst-&gt;getReg(), Operand.getReg())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for the following pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Va &lt;- TRANS VALU</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   intv</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   MI Va (WaitState = 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Where:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intv &lt;= 5 VALUs / 1 TRANS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If found, insert an appropriate S&#95;WAITCNT&#95;DEPCTR before MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvMaxVALUs = 5;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntvMaxTRANS = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">StateType &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VALUs = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/siinstrflags/#a63fe1ccb8fc5f327a64d2977fce181eca6edf620aaa09a9f39b50177b8fa809d4">TRANS</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StateType State;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This overloads expiry testing with all the hazard detection</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnhazardrecognizer/#a7927e5acc9828ba4a34fe435c4f37ddd">IsHazardFn</a> = &#91;&amp;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(StateType &amp;State, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachineInstr &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Too many VALU states have passed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (State.VALUs &gt; IntvMaxVALUs || State.TRANS &gt; IntvMaxTRANS)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HazardExpired;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions which cause va&#95;vdst==0 expire hazard</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#a08b830059090a1bb27b14e1e524fdb46">SIInstrInfo::isVMEM</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#adc3333d2d5974f4068df84f8706fc7d2">SIInstrInfo::isFLAT</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitStatesNeededForUse = NeedWaitStates - WaitStatesSinceUse;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WaitStatesNeeded = std::max(WaitStatesNeeded, WaitStatesNeededForUse);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnhazardrecognizer/#accfcd00e03bf4fddc4d3b32657c3e291"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnhazardrecognizer/#accfcd00e03bf4fddc4d3b32657c3e291">GCNHazardRecognizer::ShouldPreferAnother</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2998"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hazard sequence is three instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2999"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 VALU reads SGPR as mask</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3000"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 SALU writes SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3001"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 SALU reads SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3002"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hazard can expire if the distance between 2 and 3 is sufficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3003"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In practice this happens &lt;10% of the time, hence this always assumes</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform a post ordered reverse scan to find VALUs which read an SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before a SALU write to the same SGPR.  This provides a reduction in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hazard insertion when all VALU access to an SGPR occurs after its last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SALU write, when compared to a linear scan.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3210"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GCNHazardRecognizer::fixVALUReadSGPRHazard(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ST.hasVALUReadSGPRHazard())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The hazard sequence is fundamentally three instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 VALU reads SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 SALU writes SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 VALU/SALU reads SGPR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to avoid searching for (1) because the expiry point of the hazard is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indeterminate; however, the hazard between (2) and (3) can expire if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gap contains sufficient SALU instructions with no usage of SGPR from (1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: SGPRs must be considered as 64-bit pairs as hazard exists</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// even if individual SGPRs are accessed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MIIsSALU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#a2d7ac7b1dd9a9e4ae81fb54010f324f9">SIInstrInfo::isSALU</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MIIsVALU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#ade8d533000b775c514d9ac189b66c3a5">SIInstrInfo::isVALU</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(MIIsSALU || MIIsVALU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid expensive search when compile time is priority by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mitigating every SALU which writes an SGPR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MF.getTarget().getOptLevel() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">CodeGenOptLevel::None</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#a2d7ac7b1dd9a9e4ae81fb54010f324f9">SIInstrInfo::isSALU</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo/#a1152df63da5e2f53576d9922fa408625">SIInstrInfo::isSOPP</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MachineOperand &#42;SDSTOp =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3236"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TII.getNamedOperand(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, AMDGPU::OpName::sdst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SDSTOp || !SDSTOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PostExportPriority = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getIterator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::S&#95;ENDPGM:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::S&#95;ENDPGM&#95;SAVED:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::S&#95;ENDPGM&#95;ORDERED&#95;PS&#95;DONE:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::SI&#95;RETURN&#95;TO&#95;EPILOG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure shader with calls raises priority at entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This ensures correct priority if exports exist in callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MF-&gt;getFrameInfo().hasCalls())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#accecdb72ed09118005742bcd44b08440">ensureEntrySetPrio</a>(MF, NormalPriority, TII);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPU::S&#95;SETPRIO: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Raise minimum priority unless in workaround.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PrioOp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Prio = PrioOp.getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InWA = (Prio == PostExportPriority) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3439"><span class="doxyHighlight">                (It != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>() &amp;&amp; TII.isEXP(&#42;std::prev(It)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InWA || Prio &gt;= NormalPriority)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrioOp.setImm(std::min(Prio + NormalPriority, MaxPriority));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
